item.description:
One of our members, Monica, who is coordinator of Latino services at the Hartford Public Library, invites us all to her next public event:

GET BETWEEN THE COVERS AND READ- IN SPANISH!
Saturday, February 16, 2008
1:00 ? 2:00 p.m.

Hartford Public Library (downtown)
500 Main Street
Room is to be determined.

Come and share a literary quote, poem, passage or paragraph from a favorite book or choose a quote to read from a selection that we will provide.
LUNCH and tea will be served.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: GET BETWEEN THE COVERS AND READ- IN SPANISH
